summary.p: Blarer received the letter from the former mayor of Augsburg, Jakob Herbrot [No. 2392], the day before and is forwarding it herewith. He cannot write more, so as not to miss [the people from Zurich], whose presence he has just been informed about. He will address Bullinger's letters [No. 2387 and No. 2396] another time.

div.p: Greetings. I received yesterday these letters from Herbrot, the former mayor of Augsburg, which I am sending to you without adding anything further, as I fear that your people, whose presence I have now been informed of, might slip away from me. I will respond to your other letters another time.
